headline: VACUUM CHAMBER
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Deposition Equipment > Other Physical Vapor Deposition Equipment
specstable:
Model Vacuum Chamber
Description Vacuum Chamber
Vacuum System None
Other Information System Consist of Two Chambers Segregated by a Gate Valve With a Specimen Transfer System

Chamber 'A'

Chamber 'A' is a 10" ISO K Six Way Cross
Hinged Access Port With 6" View port
Manual Transfer Arm
6" View Port Top of Cross
KF 40 and KF 15 at Bottom of Cross
10" HVA Pneumatic Gate Valve Separating Chambers

Chamber 'B'

Chamber 'B' is a 10" ISO K Six Way Cross
6" View Port End of Chamber
6" View Port Top of Chamber
10" ISO K blank flange (Two 2 7/8" Conflat Ports shown on the photo are NOT present, one port was damaged and 10" ISO replaced with the blank)
10" ISO K open port Rear of Chamber

Exterior Dimensions
Width 34.000 in (86.4 cm)
Depth 80.000 in (203.2 cm)
Height 79.000 in (200.7 cm)
Weight 700 lb (318 kg)
